name: Get On My Level (wuchta)
description:
Short game  where you try to get on a higher level than your opponent, but be careful! If you go over the yellow line, you loose.

There's also an invisible zone, where you won't be able to see your bar. Don't worry, it's still there. Don't go too far and have fun!

"D" and "J" for controlls.

Submission for the One Button Local Multiplayer Gamejam
